sqlMap.statement: SELECT TRP.CLICK_TECH_RCV_PRT_PK ,TRP.CLICK_TRK_NUM ,TRP.RWS_STS_DESC_TXT ,TRP.TECH_CD ,TRP.WH_CD ,TRP.RTL_WH_NM ,TRP.SVC_ASG_TECH_CD ,TRP.LAST_DT_TM_UPD_TXT ,TRP.RWS_DT_TM_CLO_TXT ,TRP.CLICK_KEY_TXT ,RWH.CTRY_CD ,RWH.POST_CD FROM CLICK_TECH_RCV_PRT TRP ,RTL_WH RWH WHERE TRP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TRP.PROC_STS_CD IN (#inCompleted#, #error#) AND TRP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TRP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND TRP.TECH_CD = RWH.RTL_WH_CD(+) AND TRP.EZCANCELFLAG = RWH.EZCANCELFLAG(+) ORDER BY TRP.EZINTIME DESC
